main event: Ground-radar observation of parallel lights at Hanscom Field, Massachusetts, suspected to be navigation lights of aircraft in formation.
interesting points: The lights were observed for a duration of 3 minutes., Radar confirmed two targets under observation during the sighting., The observer used 7x50 binoculars for better visibility., Clear and calm weather conditions prevailed at the time of the sighting., There was no photograph taken or physical evidence found.
sighted object: navigation lights of aircraft in formation
witness description: Civilian or military observers, specific details were not provided.
